DCVMBasic - Class in cps.mouradalpha
The class AbstractDistributedCVM implements the multi-JVM assembly for our project, in this example we have two JVMs, one of them has a broker and a publisher, the other one has a broker and subscriber.

destroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
destroy a topic by deleting it to the list topics. the part that is responsible for the destruction is synchronized hence only one thread can this method at the same time. once the topic is deleted it notify the other brokers.
destroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.connectors.ConnectorManagementCI
calling the inbound port with the corresponding offered method.
destroyTopic(String) - Method in interface cps.mouradalpha.interfaces.ManagementImplementationI

destroy a topic using the outBoundPortPublication
destroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.InBoundPortManagement
calls the service method (destroyTopic) of the owner component (Broker) by executing a task using one of the component's threads.
destroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.OutBoundPortManagement
destroy a specific topic by calling the server component (Broker) through the connector that implements the required interface.
distribute(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
 
distributeToSubscribers(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
it called when a new message is published, basically it distribute the message for every subscriber and eventually passe through a filter
